pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, January 4, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Foreign Affairs François-Philippe Champagne will participate in a virtual event to recognize the important contributions of Global Affairs Canada employees to consular efforts over the course of 2020. Parliamentary Secretary to the Prime Minister and to the Deputy Prime Minister and the Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Omar Alghabra, and Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Foreign Affairs Rob Oliphant will be in attendance.

Closed to media.
